scripts.say: *Knock knock*
I'll get it! ...Ah, it's the Royal Navy! Please, come on in.
I hope you are having a pleasant evening. I am Belfast of the Royal Maid Fleet, and these are my companions. We have come to deliver goods as per the commander's request.
Thank you so much! We're really glad you could deliver these for us!
Hehehe~ Happy New Year! Oh wow, look at your Dragon Empery-style clothes~ You're all so pretty!
It was the commander's suggestion. We were told to experience the Lunar New Year mood. I must say I enjoy how elegant and stylish these clothes are.
Good evening~ Ahh, finally a warm house to come into. The Dragon Empery's dorm and garden have such a heartwarming atmosphere.
Ah, the Royal Navy is here as well?
Miss Lexington, Miss Enterprise, it is pleasant to see you again. What is that you're...?
They're helping us hang up the couplets!
Oh, it's the Royal Navy girls! It's been a while.
Oh, they're wearing traditional Dragon Empery clothing as well.
That's right. Let me guess: you're also wearing them because the commander asked you to...
I bought mine from Akashi out of my own pocket. Believe it or not. I have quite a few connections to the Dragon Empery. Ahaha~
And we in the Maid Fleet made our own. Our Master occasionally wishes to see us wearing clothes from another country.
I see. As for mine, Laffey and Victorious made it.
And mine is a theatrical dress. What do you think of this new direction Lady Lex is going in? Ahaha~
Since everyone's here, why don't we have a nian ye fan... Er, I mean New Year's Eve meal together?
A New Year's party, in other words? I believe that too is one of the Lunar New Year customs the commander spoke of.
The goods we delivered also contain enough food for all of the guests. As recompense for having us, please allow us to assist you with the preparations.
Please, you don't need to. A good host shouldn't let their guests help them like this.
Are you sure you don't want us to do anything to help?
Maybe we could help prepare some of this food...
An Shaaaan! Yat Sen's asking for help bringing out the food!
I can help with that too!
